verbs.description: The judge in Stormy Daniels ' lawsuit against President Donald Trump and his personal attorney , Michael Cohen , [V: has] issued a stay , delaying the case for 90 days .
[ARG0: The judge in Stormy Daniels ' lawsuit against President Donald Trump and his personal attorney , Michael Cohen ,] has [V: issued] [ARG1: a stay] , [ARGM-ADV: delaying the case for 90 days] .
